name: Roroha In My Pocket
description:
This game is based on Astro's Rorohas. It is a virtual pet in which you take care of a Roroha of your choosing (or a Roroha may choose you) from its birth, feeding it, taking it to sleep, making it happy, buying clothes and gathering memories together.

Specifications

The game was created and tested for phones with ratio between 16:9 and 20:9, I can't guarantee it'll look good in other proportions.


Colaboration

The artwork was made by Lail
